ygData.subject: Re: Enchanter on PvP Server
ygData.msgSnippet: Basically I just need to get he final blow in scenario two ... From: Ramm02@aol.com [mailto:Ramm02@aol.com] Sent: Monday, May 10, 1999 3:27 PM To:
ygData.messageBody:
Basically I just need to get he "final" blow in scenario two

-----Original Message-----
From: Ramm02@... [mailto:Ramm02@...]
Sent: Monday, May 10, 1999 3:27 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Enchanter on PvP Server


From: Ramm02@...

Currently in both scenarios you will not get the loot.

Scenario 1:

This scenario involved causing your charmed Player (pet) to commit
suicide
against a griffon. You do not get the loot if you have the person die
as
your pet. Yes, you were in control of them, but you did not get the
kill --
therefore -- no loot.

Scenario Two:

This scenario involved having your charmed player (pet) kill another
player.
There is a bug in the pet system right now. If your pet gets the final
blow,
you will not be able to loot the person. This is true of all pets
(enchanter/necro/magician/etc).


If you want to loot the person, you will have to work a little harder
than
that.
